item.description:
FESTIVAL SET TO TAKE PLACE ACROSS SIX
CONTINENTS DURING ONE WEEK IN SEPTEMBER
September 26th to October 3rd

Massachusetts Filmgoers will unite with audiences in over 203 cities across six continents starting the week of Sunday, September 26th through Sunday, October 3rd during which the
12th Annual MANHATTAN SHORT FILM FESTIVAL takes place at the venues listed below.

This year, weâ€™ve carefully selected 10 of what we feel are the most compelling Short Films out of 440 entries from 43 countries. These films will not only entertain a global audience but will be judged by this wide-ranging group of film enthusiasts as well. Filmgoers will be handed a voting card upon entry and asked to vote for the one film they think should win. Votes are tallied at each participating cinema and submitted to festival headquarters where the winner will be announced in New York City on
Sunday, October 3 at 10:00 pm.

http://msfilmfest.com...


Brookline Coolidge Corner Cimema.

7 pm, following sharing impressions at Finale, or spot of majority's choice.

Maia
781-718-6203.
Last year was great at MFA, and we chat after at Family restaurant in Brookline Village, thank to Jennifer!!
item.how_to_find_us: 10 min before start, will hold euro flag and keep seats

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group
